mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.free_no AS no, f.free_id AS id, u.name, u.user_type, u.reg_date, 'freelancer' AS role FROM freelancer f JOIN user u ON f.free_id = u.user_id UNION ALL SELECT c.ct_no AS no, c.ct_id AS id, u.name, u.user_type, u.reg_date, 'client' AS role FROM client c JOIN user u ON c.ct_id = u.user_id ) AS all_users ORDER BY all_users.reg_date DESC
SELECT f.free_no AS no, f.free_id AS id, u.name, u.user_type, u.reg_date, 'freelancer' AS role FROM freelancer f JOIN user u ON f.free_id = u.user_id ORDER BY u.reg_date DESC
SELECT c.ct_no AS no, c.ct_id AS id, u.name, u.user_type, u.reg_date, 'client' AS role FROM client c JOIN user u ON c.ct_id = u.user_id ORDER BY u.reg_date DESC
SELECT p.proj_no, p.proj_title, c.ct_id, p.reg_date, p.work_period, p.proj_status FROM project p JOIN client c ON p.ct_no = c.ct_no WHERE p.proj_status = #{status} ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC
SELECT p.proj_no, p.proj_title, c.ct_id, p.reg_date, p.work_period, p.proj_status FROM project p JOIN client c ON p.ct_no = c.ct_no ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC

SELECT s.settlement_no, s.proj_no, s.price, s.price_check, s.settled_cost, s.fee, s.settlement_check, s.settlement_requested, s.merchant_uid, p.proj_title, c.ct_id, f.free_id, u.bank_nm, u.account, u.depositor FROM settlement s JOIN project p ON s.proj_no = p.proj_no JOIN client c ON s.ct_no = c.ct_no JOIN freelancer f ON s.free_no = f.free_no JOIN user u ON f.free_id = u.user_id

SELECT s.settlement_no, s.proj_no, s.price, s.price_check, s.settled_cost, s.fee, s.settlement_check, s.settlement_requested, s.merchant_uid, p.proj_title, c.ct_id, f.free_id, u.bank_nm, u.account, u.depositor FROM settlement s JOIN project p ON s.proj_no = p.proj_no JOIN client c ON s.ct_no = c.ct_no JOIN freelancer f ON s.free_no = f.free_no JOIN user u ON f.free_id = u.user_id WHERE s.settlement_no = #{settlement_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE settlement SET price = #{price}, price_check = #{price_check}, settled_cost = #{settled_cost}, fee = #{fee}, settlement_check = #{settlement_check}, settlement_requested = #{settlement_requested}, merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid} WHERE settlement_no = #{settlement_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (proj_no, contract_title, contract_path, upload_date) VALUES (#{proj_no}, #{contract_title}, #{contract_path}, #{upload_date})
mapper.select: SELECT c.contract_no, c.proj_no, c.contract_title, c.contract_path, c.upload_date, p.proj_title, cl.ct_id, f.free_id FROM contract c JOIN project p ON c.proj_no = p.proj_no JOIN client cl ON p.ct_no = cl.ct_no JOIN freelancer f ON p.free_no = f.free_no WHERE c.contract_no = #{contract_no}

SELECT c.contract_no, c.proj_no, c.contract_title, c.contract_path, c.upload_date, p.proj_title, cl.ct_id, f.free_id FROM contract c JOIN project p ON c.proj_no = p.proj_no JOIN client cl ON p.ct_no = cl.ct_no JOIN freelancer f ON p.free_no = f.free_no
